creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three panel, four selvedge, square cut neckline; central panel, vertical zig-zag patterning; side panels of geometric patterning primarily in red, with blue, green and orange accents; bird on tree pattern; unfinished waist.
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
